title: Media Watch
brief_description: An Australian media analysis television program currently focusing on critiquing the Australian media.

constellations_other.name: Newsreel to nightly news
constellations_other.description: For decades, newsreel companies covered the news, providing weekly stories of current events, sport, and entertainment to audiences at the cinema, and establishing the format that would be taken up by television and the nightly news.

description: An Australian media analysis television program currently focusing on critiquing the Australian media.
description_for_label: An Australian media analysis television program currently focusing on critiquing the Australian media.
